core
Class EuclideApp

java.lang.Object
  core.EuclideApp

public class EuclideApp
extends java.lang.Object

EuclideApp manage changes made to documents. It also distributes DocumentChangeEvent to DocumentListener.

Author:
dlegland

public void setCurrentDoc(EuclideDoc aDoc)
Set up the current document. The document is setup only if it is contained in the list of documents.

Parameters:

addDoc

public void addDoc(EuclideDoc aDoc)
Add the given document to the list of opened docs. If this is the only opened document, also set it as current document.

Parameters:
aDoc -

public EuclideElement createEuclideElement(math.geom2d.Shape2D geometry)
